resources.string:
Hi my name is Paulo Jardim.

I am an aspiring Android Developer, currently going through the Developing Android Apps course from Udacity.

I work as Tech Support Manager, but my goal is to transition into an Android Dev role in 2022.

I live in Dun Laoghaire; a city right next to Dublin, Ireland.

Dun Laoghaire is very residential, and it has a beautiful marina with a lovely pier.

I enjoy going on long walks around Dun Laoghaire, as well as other parts of the city.
